name: hack_the_world
description:
in hack_the_world, it's the year 2020X and you're a secret agent. you have the power to change the physics of the world around you. invert gravity, remove friction, and more. use your powers to eliminate all targets and free the world.

hack_the_world was created for the A Game By Its Cover 2017 Jam, based off this wonderful game cover by graphic designer Kurt Texter:


(if you suffer from eye strain or other problems related to chromatic aberration, please play the no_chroma version of the game.)
